text.section: Upon the issuance of an order directing the commissioner to rehabilitate a domestic insurer, the court shall have exclusive jurisdiction over all matters relating to the rehabilitation, including, but not limited to, the proper scope and application of the provisions of this subtitle to the rehabilitation as well as all interpretation and enforceability of all contracts of insurance to which the insurer is a party.

law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1439, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 422, sec. 9, effective July 13, 1990. -- Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 301, subtit. 33, sec. 14, effective June 18, 1970.
